experience.title: Corporate Communications Consultant
description: Focused on strategic communications for global audiences, including employees, sales force, and vendors.
Managed global employee communications, newsletters, product releases, and announcements.
Advised on special projects such as a new global security command center and employee notification program.

experience.title: Executive Director, WSU Alumni Association & Sr. Director of Alumni Relations
description: Led alumni engagement, communications, services, and volunteer programs for 300,000+ alumni.
Managed budgetary operations of the WSU Alumni Association and Board of Directors.

experience.title: Magazine Publisher/Executive Editor
description: Oversaw Wayne State Magazine, winning multiple CASE Gold Awards for excellence in alumni publications.

experience.title: Executive Director of Marketing and Public Relations
description: Led recruitment, enrollment management, brand visibility, and advertising campaigns, including digital, radio, and outdoor media.

experience.title: Director of Marketing
description: Managed corporate healthcare marketing, brand strategy, physician group promotions, and corporate image campaigns.
